Microsoft Toolkit 2.4.9 Stable

Microsoft Toolkit formerly known as the Office 2010 Toolkit or EZ-Activator, this new version Toolkit includes Office, Office Uninstaller and Windows Toolkit for 2003/2007/2010, it does not just activate Windows, but can also enable Microsoft Office!


image


Can Activate

Enable a function KMS - for Windows Vista, 7, Windows 8/Server 2012, and Office 2010/2013


Microsoft Toolkit formerly known as the Office 2010 Toolkit or EZ-Activator, this new version Toolkit includes Office, Office Uninstaller and Windows Toolkit for 2003/2007/2010, it does not just activate Windows, but can also enable Microsoft Office!


A set of tools for managing licenses and activation for Microsoft Office and Windows. All output from these functions is displayed in the side panel information. All functions are run in the background and the graphical user interface (GUI) is disabled to prevent running multiple functions, as they may conflict or cause damage if run concurrently. Microsoft Office Functionality custom settings (Custom Settings Tab), AutoKMS uninstaller (if installed AutoKMS), AutoRearm uninstaller (if AutoRearm installed), uninstall Office and The Key control products work even if Microsoft Office or Windows is not installed or supported. Toolkit is a tool Microsoft product activation Microsoft free support enabled Windows 7, Windows 8, and Office 2010 activation. Indeed Office 2010 Toolkit version upgrade, activate Windows and Office activation function



How To Use
Just run Microsoft Toolkit (need to run as administrator), click the Office icon in the lower right corner to the Office Toolkit interface, click the Windows icon to the Windows GUI Toolkit, to enable appropriate Office 2010 and Windows systems.


Note:

YOU NEED Microsoft. NET Framework 4.0 or 4.5 (not 3.5) To Run This
